author: yogo
title: Geneva Business Development Hub
description: Impact finance and impact entrepreneurship are strong in Geneva, how to improve catalyst/Cardano collaboration?
solution: Collaborate with local players (i.e. sfgeneva.org, Seedstars, Impacthub) to promote finance and impact on Catalyst and Cardano
experience: Geneva-based, entrepreneur, 20 years of business development activities, active community member
